title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Moyne
abstract: Interviews with residents from the region of Moyne in Victoria, made as part of the 'ACMI in the Regions' program.
description: The 'ACMI in the Regions' program aims to encourage regional storytelling on-screen and to equip local participants with the knowledge, confidence and skills to practice, long into the future, the art and craft of the moving image.  ACMI adopts a community cultural development approach to our work in regional areas. Actively engaging local residents in the process of storytelling and film production, participation helps people to document their histories and capture their own stories; to express and explore on-screen why they live and work and play in the towns they call home.  This program contains nine stories about residents from the Moyne region in South-Western Victoria. Covering the towns of Port Fairy, Yambuk and Caramut, locals tell stories about their lives and their connection to the land and the community.
